Name: Re:Gals Panic
About the game: Retro Arcade Classic gameplay re-make Draw lines to expand your territory and reveal the pretty skin of sexy gals… 【Gameplay】 ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━◈ ♖ Movement Control ：'W' (▲) / 'A' (◀) / 'S' (▼) / 'D' (▶) ♖ Draw Lines ：Mouse Left Button (“Z” /Spacebar) ♖ Special Skill ：Mouse Right Button ('X' /Enter) ♜ Movement + Draw Lines ：To expand your territory and reveal more of the gal’s picture. ♜ Charm Special Skill - Stone Gaze ：This skill will freeze all the enemies in the field. ♜ Conquer Special Skill - Cyclone Speed ：Movement speed up. 【Game Features】 ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━◈ ♡ Pretty gals for you to conquer 　Poor shy Nun, or proud sexy dark elf Assassin, what are you waiting for? ♡ Reveal the pretty gals 　Reveal the pretty skin of the sexy gals, step by step. Every move stirs more desire and momentum. ♡ Pretty and elegant 　Show High quality CGs of 6 pretty and elegant gals, with sexy body postures. ✧ Fun and exciting 　Excite retro-style game play that requires quick reflexes and strategy planning. ✧ Two ways of challenge 　You can decide to charm or conquer, which reveal different results. ✧ Finish and Collect 　You can take your time and re-watch all the CGs in memory mode after you complete the level challenge. 【Story Introduction】 ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━◈ Behold, Mortals. All the pretty gals are mine. Your puny struggle is meaningless… Hahahahaha Try resist, my little beauty, I will penetrate your weakness, With my powerful charm and passion, you will be drawn to me like moth into flame… Try struggle, my pretty babe, All your defense are futile, My power will destroy the strongest defense and make you mine. Choose to Charm or to Conquerr 【Special Thanks】 ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━◈ Music： 魔王魂
